trans-unit.source: Declares a mapping between a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] and a prefix.

To declare a mapping between a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] and a prefix, create an XmlNamespaceMapping class and add it to an <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMappingCollection> object that is used as the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager%2A> for a binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping"></xref> class with the specified prefix and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
The prefix to use in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
The <xref:System.Uri> of the namespace to create the mapping for.
Returns a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping"></xref> is equivalent to the specified instance.
The instance to compare for equality.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two instances are the same; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping"></xref>.
The hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping"></xref>.
Performs equality comparison by value.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping"></xref> object to compare.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping"></xref> object to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping"></xref> objects are the same; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Performs inequality comparison by value.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping"></xref> object to compare.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping"></xref> object to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping"></xref> objects are not the same; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the prefix to use in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
The prefix to associate with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
The default is an empty string("").
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Uri> of the namespace for which to create a mapping.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the namespace.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
